Package org.elasticsearch.cluster.action.index

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MappingUpdatedAction.MappingUpdateListener
    A listener to be notified when the mappings were updated
    NodeIndexDeletedAction.Listener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MappingUpdatedAction
    Called by shards in the cluster when their mapping was dynamically updated and it needs to be updated in the cluster state meta data (and broadcast to all members).
    NodeIndexDeletedAction  
    NodeIndexDeletedAction.NodeIndexDeletedMessage  
    NodeIndexDeletedAction.NodeIndexStoreDeletedMessage  
    NodeMappingRefreshAction  
    NodeMappingRefreshAction.NodeMappingRefreshRequest
